verses.verse: Now<WG1161> concerning the things<WG4012> about which<WG3739> you wrote<WG1125> to me:<WG3427> it is good<WG2570> for a man<WG444> not<WG3361> to touch<WG680> a woman.<WG1135>
But,<WG1223> because of sexual immoralities,<WG4202> let each man<WG1538> have<WG2192> his own<WG1438> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> let each woman<WG1538> have<WG2192> her own<WG2398> husband.<WG435>
Let the husband<WG435> render<WG591> to his wife<WG1135> the affection<WG2133> owed<WG3784> her,<WG1161> and likewise<WG3668> also<WG2532> the wife<WG1135> to her husband.<WG435>

The wife<WG1135> doesn't<WG3756> have<WG1850> authority<WG1850> over her own<WG2398> body,<WG4983> but<WG235> the husband.<WG435> <WG1161> Likewise<WG3668> also<WG2532> the husband<WG435> doesn't<WG3756> have<WG1850> authority<WG1850> over his own<WG2398> body,<WG4983> but<WG235> the wife.<WG1135>

Don't<WG3361> deprive<WG650> one another,<WG240> unless<WG5100><WG99999> it is by<WG1537> consent<WG4859> for<WG4314> a season,<WG2540> that<WG2443> you may give yourselves<WG4980> to fasting<WG3521> and<WG2532> prayer,<WG4335> and<WG2532> may be together<WG1909> <WG846> again,<WG3825> that<WG2443> Satan<WG4567> doesn't<WG3361> tempt<WG3985> you<WG5209> because<WG1223> of your<WG5216> lack of self-control.<WG192>
But<WG1161> this<WG5124> I say<WG3004> by<WG2596> way of concession,<WG4774> not<WG3756> of<WG2596> commandment.<WG2003>

Yet<WG1063> I wish<WG2309> that all<WG3956> men<WG444> were<WG1511> <WG2532> like<WG5613> me.<WG1683> However<WG235> each man<WG1538> has<WG2192> his<WG2398> own gift<WG5486> from<WG1537> God,<WG2316> one<WG3739><WG99999> of this kind,<WG3779> and<WG1161> another<WG3739> of that kind.<WG3779>
But<WG1161> I say<WG3004> to the unmarried<WG22> and<WG2532> to widows,<WG5503> it is<WG2076> good<WG2570> for them<WG846> if<WG1437> they remain<WG3306> even<WG5613> as I am.<WG2504>
But<WG1161> if<WG1487> they<WG1467> don't<WG3756> have self-control,<WG1467> let them marry.<WG1060> For<WG1063> it<WG2076>'s better<WG2908> to marry<WG1060> than<WG2228> to burn.<WG4448>
But<WG1161> to the married<WG1060> I command<WG3853> — not<WG3756> I,<WG1473> but<WG235> the Lord<WG2962> — that the wife<WG1135> not<WG3361> leave<WG5563> <WG575> her husband<WG435>

(but<WG1161> <WG2532> if<WG1437> she departs,<WG5563> let her remain<WG3306> unmarried,<WG22> or<WG2228> else be reconciled<WG2644> to her husband<WG435>), and<WG2532> <WG863> that the husband<WG435> not<WG3361> leave<WG863> his wife.<WG1135>

But<WG1161> to the rest<WG3062> I<WG1473> — not<WG3756> the Lord<WG2962> — say,<WG3004> if any<WG5100> brother<WG80> has<WG2192> an unbelieving<WG571> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> she<WG846> is content<WG4909> to live<WG3611> with<WG3326> him,<WG863> let him<WG846> not<WG3361> leave<WG863> her.<WG846>

The<WG2532> woman<WG1135> who<WG3748> has<WG2192> an unbelieving<WG571> husband,<WG435> and<WG2532> he<WG846> is content<WG4909> to live<WG3611> with<WG3326> her,<WG846> let her<WG863> not<WG3361> leave<WG863> her husband.<WG846>

For<WG1063> the unbelieving<WG571> husband<WG435> is sanctified<WG37> in<WG1722> the wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> the unbelieving<WG571> wife<WG1135> is sanctified<WG37> in<WG1722> the husband.<WG435> Otherwise<WG686> <WG1893> your<WG5216> children<WG5043> would be<WG2076> unclean,<WG169> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> they<WG2076> are holy.<WG40>

Yet<WG1161> if<WG1487> the unbeliever<WG571> departs,<WG5563> let there be separation.<WG5563> The brother<WG80> or<WG2228> the sister<WG79> is<WG3756> not<WG3756> under bondage<WG1402> in<WG1722> such<WG5108> cases,<WG1161> but God<WG2316> has called<WG2564> us<WG2248> in<WG1722> peace.<WG1515>

For<WG1063> how<WG5101> do you<WG1492> know,<WG1135> wife, whether<WG1487> you will save<WG4982> your husband?<WG435> Or<WG2228> how<WG5101> do you<WG1492> know,<WG435> husband, whether<WG1487> you will save<WG4982> your wife?<WG1135>

Only,<WG1487> <WG3361> as<WG5613> the Lord<WG2316> has distributed<WG3307> to each<WG1538> man,<WG1538> as<WG5613> God<WG2962> has called<WG2564> each,<WG1538> so<WG3779> let him walk.<WG4043> So<WG3779> I<WG1299> command in<WG1722> all<WG3956> the assemblies.<WG1577>

Was<WG2564> anyone<WG5100> called<WG2564> having been circumcised?<WG4059> Let him<WG1986> not<WG3361> become uncircumcised.<WG1986> Has<WG2564> anyone<WG5100> been called<WG2564> in<WG1722> uncircumcision?<WG203> Let him<WG4059> not<WG3361> be circumcised.<WG4059>
Circumcision<WG4061> is<WG2076> nothing,<WG3762> and<WG2532> uncircumcision<WG203> is<WG2076> nothing,<WG3762> but<WG235> the keeping<WG5084> of the commandments<WG1785> of God.<WG2316>
Let each man<WG1538> stay<WG3306> in<WG1722> that calling<WG2821> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> he was called.<WG2564>

Were you called<WG2564> being a bondservant?<WG1401> Don't<WG3361> let that bother<WG3199> you,<WG4671> but<WG235> if<WG1487> <WG2532> you get<WG1410> an opportunity<WG3123> to become<WG1096> free,<WG1658> use it.<WG5530>

For<WG1063> he who<WG3588> was called<WG2564> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> being a bondservant<WG1401> is<WG2076> the Lord<WG2962>'s free man.<WG558> Likewise<WG3668> <WG2532> he who<WG3588> was called<WG2564> being free<WG1658> is<WG2076> Christ<WG5547>'s bondservant.<WG1401>
You<WG1096> were bought<WG59> with a price.<WG5092> Don't<WG3361> become<WG1096> bondservants<WG1401> of men.<WG444>
Brothers,<WG80> let each man,<WG1538> in whatever<WG1722> <WG3739> condition he was called,<WG2564> stay<WG3306> in<WG1722> that<WG5129> condition with<WG3844> God.<WG2316>

Now<WG1161> concerning<WG4012> virgins,<WG3933> I have<WG2192> no<WG3756> commandment<WG2003> from the Lord,<WG2962> but<WG1161> I give<WG1325> my judgment<WG1106> as<WG5613> one who has obtained mercy<WG1653> from<WG5259> the Lord<WG2962> to be<WG1511> trustworthy.<WG4103>

I think<WG3543> that it<WG5124> is<WG5225> good<WG2570> therefore,<WG3767> because<WG1223> of the distress<WG318> that is<WG5225> on<WG1764> us,<WG3754> that it is good<WG2570> for a man<WG444> to be as he is.<WG1511>
Are you bound<WG1210> to a wife?<WG1135> Don't<WG3361> seek<WG2212> to be freed.<WG3080> Are you free<WG3089> from<WG575> a wife?<WG1135> Don't<WG3361> seek<WG2212> a wife.<WG1135>

But<WG1161> <WG2532> if<WG1437> you marry,<WG1060> you have<WG264> not<WG3756> sinned.<WG264> <WG2532> If<WG1437> a virgin<WG3933> marries,<WG1060> she has<WG264> not<WG3756> sinned.<WG264> Yet<WG1161> such<WG5108> will have<WG2192> oppression<WG2347> in the flesh,<WG4561> and<WG4561> I<WG1473> want to spare<WG5339> you.<WG5216>

But<WG1161> I say<WG5346> this,<WG5124> brothers:<WG80> the time<WG4958> is short,<WG3588> that<WG2532> from now on,<WG2076> both<WG3588> those who<WG2192> have<WG1135> wives<WG5613> may be as<WG3361> though<WG5600> they had<WG5600> none;<WG2443>

and<WG2532> those<WG3588> who weep,<WG2799> as though<WG5613> they<WG3588> didn't<WG3361> weep;<WG2799> and<WG2532> those who rejoice,<WG5463> as though<WG5613> they<WG3588> didn't<WG3361> rejoice;<WG5463> and<WG2532> those who buy,<WG59> as though<WG5613> they didn't<WG3361> possess;<WG2722>

and<WG2532> those<WG3588> who use<WG5530> the<WG5129> world,<WG2889> as<WG5613> not<WG3361> using<WG2710> it to the fullest.<WG1063> For the mode<WG4976> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889> passes away.<WG3855>

But<WG1161> I desire to have<WG2309> you<WG5209> to be free from cares.<WG275> He<WG3588> who is<WG1511> unmarried<WG22> is concerned for<WG3309> the things<WG3588> of the Lord,<WG2962> how<WG4459> he may please<WG700> the Lord;<WG2962>
but<WG1161> he<WG3588> who is married<WG1060> is concerned about<WG3309> the things<WG3588> of the world,<WG2889> how<WG4459> he may please<WG700> his wife.<WG1135>

There is also a difference<WG3307> between<WG3307> a wife<WG1135> and<WG2532> a virgin.<WG3933> The unmarried<WG22> woman cares about the things<WG3588> of the Lord,<WG2962> that<WG2443> she may be<WG5600> holy<WG40> both<WG2532> in body<WG4983> and<WG2532> in spirit.<WG4151> But<WG1161> she<WG3588> who is married<WG1060> cares about the things<WG3588> of the world<WG2889> — how<WG4459> she may please<WG700> her husband.<WG435>

<WG1161> This<WG5124> I say<WG3004> for<WG4314> your<WG5216> own<WG846> profit;<WG4851> not<WG3756> that<WG2443> I may<WG1911> ensnare<WG1029> you,<WG5213> but<WG235> for<WG4314> that which is appropriate,<WG2158> and<WG2532> that you may attend to<WG2145> the Lord<WG2962> without distraction.<WG563>

But<WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> thinks<WG3543> that<WG3739> he<WG846> is behaving<WG807> inappropriately<WG807> toward<WG1909> his virgin,<WG3933> if<WG1437> she is past<WG5600> the flower of<WG5230> her age,<WG5230> and<WG2532> if need<WG3784> so<WG3779> requires,<WG1096> let him do<WG4160> what he desires.<WG2309> He doesn't<WG3756> sin.<WG264> Let them marry.<WG1060>

But<WG1161> he who<WG3739> stands<WG2476> steadfast<WG1476> in<WG1722> his heart,<WG2588> having<WG2192> no<WG3361> necessity,<WG318> but<WG1161> has<WG2192> power<WG1849> over<WG4012> his<WG1438> own<WG2398> heart,<WG2307> to keep<WG5083> his<WG846> own virgin,<WG3933> does<WG4160> well.<WG2476>

So<WG5620> then<WG2532> both he<WG3588> who gives<WG1547> his own virgin in marriage<WG1547> does<WG4160> well,<WG2573> and<WG1161> he<WG3588> who doesn't<WG3361> give<WG1547> her in marriage<WG1547> does<WG4160> better.<WG2908>

A wife<WG1135> is bound<WG1210> by law<WG3551> for as<WG1909> long<WG5550> as<WG3745> her<WG846> husband<WG435> lives;<WG2198> but<WG1161> if<WG1437> the<WG846> husband<WG435> is dead,<WG2837> she is<WG2076> free<WG1658> to be married to<WG1060> whomever<WG3739> she desires,<WG2309> only<WG3440> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

But<WG1161> she is<WG2076> happier<WG3107> if<WG1437> she<WG3306> stays<WG3306> as<WG3779> she is,<WG2596> in my<WG1699> judgment,<WG1106> and<WG1161> I<WG2504> think<WG1380> that I also<WG2504> have<WG2192> God<WG2316>'s Spirit.<WG4151>
